reviewText:
This is a great DVD of the background of the circus which is M.C.'d by Zachary Gordon (Star of the Diary of a Wimpy Kid movies)  He does a great job of showing us all the different behind the scenes of the Greatest Show on Earth.

Very enjoyable to watch and a fun family movie to see.

Ringling Bros. fools us with this DVD. This DVD is NOT of the circus performance / show itself.  It is ONLY highlights and some behind-the-scenes footage.  Don't buy this if you think you will see the show itself.
